name: 阿尔沃行动
abstract: 《阿尔沃行动》是一款全新的拟真VR FPS游戏，它专门为VR设计，为你提供惊险刺激的VR FPS战斗体验。

detail.app_languages: Traditional Chinese, Russian, Portuguese, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
.You can release your primary hand from the guns and be able to drop it
.Reduced game size and improved loading times
.Adjusted pit spawn points
.Gun tracking is smoothed out
.Fixed downed character having wrong rotation at times
.SND revives count for experience
.Dual SMGs are no longer the default on Loadout 1
.Fixed ability to shoot thorugh walls with some weapons
.Fixed third person player not moving arms after respawning on SND
.Fixed third person player not grabbing gun when it should
.Fixed stuck red dot on minimap
.Fixed scope reticle not working in certain scenarios
.Improved Title Screen leaderboard
.Multiple other bug fixes
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
